precautions: Tamsol-d capsule precautions are listed below to obtain beneficial results while taking this medicine.Before taking the Tamsol-d capsule, inform the doctorAbout your complete medical history. Especially if you are suffering from kidney disease, liver problems, and muscles problem.If you are taking any prescription at the current time or have followed a couple of weeks earlier. Also inform him, if you are currently taking any supplements such as herbal supplements or multivitamin supplements. Inform the doctor about other current medical conditions such as upcoming surgery, pregnancy, allergic problem, etc.Inform the doctor if you have hypersensitivity problems such as nausea, allergic reactions, skin-related problems, etc., from the ingredients used in the composition of the Tamsol-d capsule. Inform the doctor if the following medical conditions persist, as a result of side effectsBreast enlargement and its tenderness.If the prostate infection persists.If you are taking the sulpha drugs, then use them with specific cautions and use them continuously unless your doctor advises you to stop taking this medicine.Avoid donating blood while taking after almost six months of use of this medicine.It can also affect the sperm count. Therefore, use this medicine with caution.Keep the medicine away from the reach of children and pets.Check the expiry date of the medicine before using it.Avoid the use of heavy machinery if this medicine results in side effects of dizziness, drowsiness, etc.If you have further queries about the precautions, then you can consult your pharmacist for your satisfaction.Contraindications Tamsol-d capsule contraindications are listed below.Tamsol-d capsule is contraindicated to patients suffering from liver disease and severe dizziness problems.It is contraindicated in the following medical condition such as hypersensitivity problem from the ingredients used in the composition of Tamsol-d capsule, history of prostate cancer, and undergoing antigen assay.It is also contraindicated to the patients having an allergic problem.
effects: Tamsol-d capsule can cause some side effects that can be temporary or may persist and can cause some serious side effects that can be dangerous for a healthy life. The possible side effects are described below. However, the list will not be comprehensive. The reason is that they may occur sometimes but not always occur. The common side effect caused by the Tamsol-d capsule is headache, vomiting, dizziness, constipation, and diarrhea. The other common and temporary side effects of Tamsol-d capsule are runny nose, breast tenderness, low blood pressure, ejaculation, and fever. These side effects may disappear after a couple of weeks, but if they persist, consult your doctor.The serious side effects caused by the Tamsol-d capsule are breast enlargement, urge to vomit, impotence, decreased libido, and palpitations. The rare but serious side effects caused by this medicine are hypersensitivity reactions, skin reactions, skin rashes, skin itching, allergic reaction and the rashes due to allergy on the skin, and sexual dysfunction.If any of the above-described side effects or get serious, then you can contact your doctor for immediate medical help to avoid the possible risks of the adverse side effect result. Also, the above list may not contain all of the possible side effects. So, if you notice the other symptoms, consult the doctor for clinical help.
